# logtail_dashboard_template (Data Source)

This data source allows you to look up dashboard templates by ID or name. For more information about dashboard templates check https://betterstack.com/dashboards/



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the dashboard template to retrieve.
- `name` (String) The name of the dashboard template.

### Read-Only

- `data` (String) The dashboard template configuration data in JSON format.
